name: Prison 44, Part 2
description:
Part Two has two maps to try!

Here are two more maps to play from the, "Prison 44," game that I uploaded a couple weeks ago. Because of the file size limitations I'm uploading these as separate files.

Your main mission is to escape and stay alive.

Enjoy!

If you're interested, you can download Part One here... https://3-beams-studio.itch.io/prison-44
